allow: Bash(if exist nul echo "File exists" else echo "File does not exist")

Bash(/tmp/update_components.sh << 'SCRIPT'
#!/bin/bash

# Atualizar importações nos componentes

find "c:\\www\\softLive\\projects\\navegaja\\navegaJaAPP\\src\\components" -type f \\\( -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.tsx" \\\) | while read -r file; do
  echo "Processando: $file"
  
  # Substituir importações relativas entre componentes
  # Ex: from '../Box/Box' -> from '@components'
  # Precisamos ser mais específicos aqui para não quebrar exports
  
  # Para arquivos de componentes individuais, atualizar apenas os imports
  sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/Box\\/Box['\\"]|from '@components'|g" "$file"
  sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/Text\\/Text['\\"]|from '@components'|g" "$file"
  sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/Icon\\/Icon['\\"]|from '@components'|g" "$file"
  sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/Button\\/Button['\\"]|from '@components'|g" "$file"
  sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/TextInput\\/TextInput['\\"]|from '@components'|g" "$file"
  sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/TouchableOpacityBox\\/TouchableOpacityBox['\\"]|from '@components'|g" "$file"
  
  # Substituir importações de domain
  sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/\\.\\.\\/domain|from '@domain|g" "$file"
  sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/\\.\\.\\/\\.\\.\\/domain|from '@domain|g" "$file"
done

echo "Concluído!"
SCRIPT)

Bash(/tmp/update_routes.sh << 'SCRIPT'
#!/bin/bash

# Atualizar importações nos arquivos de routes e outros

find "c:\\www\\softLive\\projects\\navegaja\\navegaJaAPP\\src\\routes" -type f \\\( -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.tsx" \\\) | while read -r file; do
  echo "Processando: $file"
  
  sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/components['\\"]|from '@components'|g" "$file"
  sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/screens['\\"]|from '@screens'|g" "$file"
  sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/domain|from '@domain|g" "$file"
done

# Atualizar hooks se existir
if [ -d "c:\\www\\softLive\\projects\\navegaja\\navegaJaAPP\\src\\hooks" ]; then
  find "c:\\www\\softLive\\projects\\navegaja\\navegaJaAPP\\src\\hooks" -type f \\\( -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.tsx" \\\) | while read -r file; do
    echo "Processando: $file"
    
    sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/api['\\"]|from '@api'|g" "$file"
    sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/domain|from '@domain|g" "$file"
  done
fi

# Atualizar utils se existir
if [ -d "c:\\www\\softLive\\projects\\navegaja\\navegaJaAPP\\src\\utils" ]; then
  find "c:\\www\\softLive\\projects\\navegaja\\navegaJaAPP\\src\\utils" -type f \\\( -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.tsx" \\\) | while read -r file; do
    echo "Processando: $file"
    
    sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/api['\\"]|from '@api'|g" "$file"
    sed -i "s|from ['\\"]\\.\\.\\/domain|from '@domain|g" "$file"
  done
fi

echo "Concluído!"
SCRIPT)
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-NetIPAddress -AddressFamily IPv4 | Where-Object {$_IPAddress -notlike ''127.*'' -and $_IPAddress -notlike ''169.*''} | Select-Object IPAddress, InterfaceAlias")
